general.headline: Talent Acquisition Ninja | Passionate about Connecting High Performers to Meaningful Careers | 26K+ Followers
general.description:
Driving extreme value through hiring!! 

A Strategic Talent Acquisition professional with over 6 years+ of experience in the expert witness recruitment and talent management and a fearless 'can-do' attitude. I bring a valuable depth and breadth of experience to find the right fit for given requirement. Holding a track record of attracting candidates, developing talent management analytics, including benchmarking and formulating best practices. Experience in Managing entire selection process for assigned vacancies including Headhunting, Sourcing, Interviewing and negotiating with candidates.

Need a really hard to find an expert? I love a good research and recruiting challenge.

Formulated a robust and efficient talent acquisition strategy while hiring Mid/Senior Management positions and promoting proactive recruitment, reduced recruitment life-cycle, and costs.

Talent Acquisition - Recruitment Strategy - Sourcing, Social Recruiting - Leadership Hiring - Employer Branding, Talent Mapping - Leadership & Team Management - Behavioral Selection Techniques

Outside of work, I enjoy travelling, watching movies and reading books!

jobs.description:
•	Responsible for End to End hiring for mid to senior level positions from sourcing to closure of the requisition 
•	Formulate Talent Sourcing Strategy & Recruiting goals to support company requirements.
•	Effective utilization of internal and external sources of recruitment like local Job portals, making direct contact calls, networking, leveraging relevant social media, LinkedIn being the key area of talent pooling.
•	Assisting the hiring managers to define and qualify requirements and thereby designing and implementing recruiting strategies.
•	Act as the main point of contact for all interview scheduling, pre-interview plan, post-interview follow-up, and all on-boarding activities such as background checks and candidate relocation.
•	Driving the sourcing, selection & interviewing process in collaboration with the hiring managers and effectively handling the offer roll out & on-boarding process.
•	Formulating various strategies to attract talented professionals and passive candidates. 
•	Responsible for activation of various sourcing channels like employee referrals, internal job postings, job portals, networking, scheduled recruitment drives and general walk-ins.
•	Playing a role of a screening mechanism for the hiring managers. 
•	Developing a strong network of Professionals in IT Industry so as to get more leads and information to source the best candidates.

My primary responsibilities are as follows:

• Handling recruitment starting from understanding the need, sourcing the candidates, handling interview process, rolling out offers, ensuring that candidate joins at the right time.
• Sourcing from Job Portals, Social platform.
• 360 degree Recruitment Process –Technical Recruitment (PHP Developers, SEO Executive, SEO Manager, PPC, Web Designer, Graphic Designer, Visualizer, Magento Developer, Wordpress Developer, Content Writer, Project Manager, BDE/BDM)
• Policies formulation
• Employee Induction
• Maintain and Updating Master sheet (all employees' detail) time to time.
• Joining and Exit formalities
• Handling Attendance and Leave Management.
• Performance Management
• Mediator between management and employees.
• Employee Engagement Activities

general.headline: Assistant Manager at Solarig Gensol Utilities Pvt Ltd
general.description:
Looking forward to be a part of a dynamic team in a reputed organization having abundant scopes and recognition for hard work, honesty and sincerity, where my conceptual knowledge, experience, communication skills and capabilities to achieve organizational goals and enhance my skills with the growth of organization.

Having the exposure to understand business, conceptualize and offer strategic staffing solutions. Have worked very closely with Business vertical Directors, CEOs’ & Project Mangers to understand their business strategy, challenges and streamline the HR processes, KRAs/KPIs to ensure the business growth. 

Areas of Expertise: 
Having over all 3 years of experience in HR Generalist profile with expertise in : 
•	Talent Planning
•	Talent Acquisition
•	Talent Retention
•	HR Process from joining to exit
•	Attrition management 
•	HR Policy framing & implementation
•	Labour Compliance
•	Leaves & Payroll
•	KRA & KPI based Performance management
•	Employee engagement & Motivation
•	Employee Information Management System
•	Employee grievance redressal
•	Employer Brand Management
•	ERP – HR implementation and Organization Development

jobs.description:
Solarig Gensol Utilities Pvt Ltd is a Joint Venture between Solarig Ngage from Spain and Gensol Engineering Pvt Ltd from India. Solarig Gensol Utilities Pvt Ltd, ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 certified, offers Operation & Maintenance Services for Solar Power Projects as an independent Operator agnostic to any particular make, technology, EPC or IPP with more than 13 years of experience. Company headquartered at Ahmadabad with a team size of 350+ talented and goal driven professionals servicing. It has become one of India’s leading Solar O&M player with 1.3 GWP under O&M with marquee clients like Delhi International Airport, Suzlon, Greenko, Essel Infra and more.

Strategic Human Resources Management that I handle:
•	Identifies the critical success factors from an HR & IR perspective and formulates the strategy.
•	Plans for headcount to staff the positions based on requirements .
•	Tracks staff movement, attrition and vacancies and ensures vacancies are filled within stipulated time using the most effective and cost efficient method and sources.
•	Initiates and participates in the selection process to select the most suitable internal/external candidates.
•	Determines the appropriate structure for the company using market trends and data,   implements reward and recognition programs including decisions on bonuses and increments.
•	Directs and monitors the conduct of performance appraisal as per set schedules, provides technical guidance to appraisers, oversees proper documentation and timely decision making of related decisions
•	Assist in payroll preparation by providing relevant data (absences, bonus, leaves, etc).
•	Formulates policies related to people management, attraction, deployment and development to build a positive and performance-oriented culture in the Company.
•	Deal with employee requests regarding human resources issues.

e-Procurement Technologies Limited (ETL), an ISO 9001 & ISMS 27001,CMMI level 5 Certified, leading e-Procurement solution and services providing company headquartered at Ahmadabad with a team size of 650+ talented and goal driven professionals servicing in 21 cities throughout India.ETL has been awarded as “Best Software Product Company” by Gujarat Electronics and Software Industries Association(GESIA).

Strategic Human Resources Management that I handle:

•	Understand the Vision & Goals of business vertical heads and align all HR practices towards it
•	Talent planning, Acquisition and Retention
•	Draft , implement & control KRAs and KPIs
•	Design, Draft and implement : HR Policy & Procedures, Employee Handbook, PPT, Process Chart, Controlled document/Excel etc 
•	ISO 9001 , ISO 27001 and CMMI Documentation
•	Ensure Job offer, Pre joining, joining, Induction, Job confirmation, EIMS and Exit are executed as per SOP. (Standard Operating Procedure)	
•	Manage all HR communication with internal and external stake holders 
•	Initiate and Organize employee engagement activities like HR events, Games ,Sports ,Team outings etc 
•	Ensure the EIMS (Employee Information Management System) are Instant Available, Reliable and updated. 
•	Manage Performance Appraisal 
•	Employee grievance redressal management 
•	Manage labour compliance, Leaves, Salary and Taxation. 
•	Analysis of Exit and implement retention strategies

jobs.description:
• Responsible for End to End recruitment consulting including Talent Search, Headhunting, Business   Development and HOD  coordination in market.
• Work with assistant HR Manager on recruiting planning meetings.
• Create job descriptions and job specification for given position.
• Maintain all pertinent applicant and interview data in TAT.
• Identify strategic sources for talent and measure result of each source.
• Review applicant to evaluate if they meet the position requirements.
• Maintain regular contact with possible future candidates.
• Conduct prescreening interview.
• Co-ordination with HOD.
• Sending salary break-up to candidates.
• Negotiation salary with candidates.
• Generating offer letter and appointment letters of new joinees.
• Assist in performing reference and background checks for potential employees.
• Assisting in joining process of selected candidate.

Recruitment
      

    Team Handling
      

    
      Team management

Sourcing resumes from different job portals as per the requirement from Client Company.
• Using networking in order to attract business from client companies.
• Developing a good understanding of client companies, their industry, and their work culture and environment.
• Completing a search of the candidate database to find the right person for the employer's vacancy.
• Building relationships with Candidates
• Headhunting - identifying and approaching suitable candidates.
• Briefing the candidate about the responsibilities, salary and benefits of the job in question.
• Requesting references and checking the suitability of applicants before submitting their details to the employer.
• Formatting resumes and correspondence to forward to clients in respect of suitable applicants.
• Organizing interviews for candidate as requested by the client.
• Informing candidates about the results of their interviews.
• Negotiating pay and salary rates and finalizing arrangements between client and candidates.
• Offering advice to both clients and candidates on pay rates, training and career progression.
• Reviewing recruitment policies to ensure effectiveness of selection techniques and recruitment programmed.
• Responsible for End to End recruitment consulting including Talent Search, Headhunting, Business      Development and client coordination in India as well as international markets.

general.headline: Native/ React Native Mobile Application Development || Mobile Application Design || Website Development
general.description:
I work as a CTO in the company I co-founded - YoungBrainz Infotech Private Limited. 

I look after technology and project delivery aspects in my primary role. 

If you want to develop a mobile app that works independently, or works with an integrated cloud, such as AWS, feel free to contact. 

If you want to develop a website that can improve the marketing of your business, feel free to contact me. For you, it will be as easy as writing a Microsoft Word document. 

If you want to develop a web-based system which interacts with RDBMS such as MySQL, MSSQL or PostgreSQL, or NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, feel free to contact me. 

When you work with me and my YoungBrainz team, you won't feel like working with an "outsourcing company" but a technology partner. Come, experience it with a small pilot project. 

Have questions? Reach out to me via LinkedIn Messaging or send me an Email on vikita@youngbrainzinfotech.com.

jobs.description:
YB is a full-service mobile technology company with focus on solving problems with mobile-first approach.

When you work with YB, you get to work with the team that is not only passionate about technology but also about solving complex business problems.

Within the span of past 2 years, YB team has served over 25 clients internationally.

If you want to develop a mobile app developed or a software created, get in touch with YB's technology consulting team and get a 30-minute free evaluation of your project.

I started my career with Space-O Technologies, where I was responsible to design and develop iOS apps. My role included designing  clean UI and  development of international quality code.

My role involved self-organizing myself that would help me in a senior roles such as a project manager or a CTO in future.

I also had an opportunity to work as a dedicated developer for which I’m thankful to management of Space-O because it has helped me a lot to improve my communication skills and build self-confidence.

I leveraged project collaboration tools such as Basecamp, Skype and Slack to keep in regular touch with clients and colleagues.

jobs.description:
Recruitment & Selection: Understanding the hiring requirements & supporting the business, Sourcing candidates using job portals, job posting, networking sites and references,  Organizing interviews, negotiating salaries and following up with candidates till joining.
 
Induction: Taking care of joining formalities of new employees, updating & maintaining the employee database, personal files with the registration in web-based/in-house software & ensuring the creation of official mail ID. Conducting business & culture oriented induction session.

Employee Database, Attendance & Leave Management: Maintaining, updating and accurate employee related information for quick reference for the purpose of salary, Preparation  Monthly Attendance Sheet for each employee in excel sheet & also Maintaining Leave records in excel sheets.

Employee Engagement: Organized & coordinated events like Days Celebration with fun activities at work & festival celebrations. These activities engage employees in curricular activities, reduces stress, achieve good teamwork.

Employee Grievances & Employee Relations: By implementing & managing change; Handled employee’s queries and grievances on daily basis and ensuring the accurate and earliest solution; to motive the employees and appreciating them for their good work. 

HRIS: Ensuring the registration of new joiners, updation of the resigned employees, promotions, transfers and confirmation updation in the HRIS. Looking after the employee’s attendance and leaves marked in HRIS.

Performance Appraisal: Ensuring the performance appraisal is done of confirmed employees with supervisor and next level supervisor depending upon their KSI & KRAs.

Employee Off Boarding: Exit interview, defining notice period, handover form check & review, issuance of relieving & experience letter along with full & final statement & close the personal file of associate.

jobs.description:
-.Lucky Stars (Android Application)
  Environment - Android Application
  Database - mongoDB, API
  Role - Developer
Project Objectives - I am Currently Work on this Project It is an exciting marketing
platform for Brands to capitalize on,
for advertising and promotions. With a captive audience spread across India.This is Free
Winning Gifts Application also It's in Draw, Bid and Quiz conduct.

-. I Love London (Android Application)
   Environment - Android Business Application
   Database - mongoDB
   Role - Developer
Project Objectives - This Application's main goal is online Tour & Travels, Restaurant, Bar,
Cafe and Theaters Ticket Booking online System.

-. MenuVenu (Android Application)
   Environment - Android Business Application
   Database - Firebase
    Role - Devloper
Project Objectives - It is restaurant management system. It consists of 3 main
components. A smartphone app for the diners, a smartphone app for restaurant staff, and
a web-based system for restaurants. I am working on the smartphone app development.
It is used by restaurants in Pune and mumbai and also expanding in other cities. It
consists of modules such as ordering, payments using payment gateways such as
Paytm, UPI, mobikwik, etc. order history, social media sharing and inviting other diners.
There are plenty of other features in pipeline.

-. Howlloop (Web Application)
  Environment - Web Application for Internal communication
  Database - SQL, Firebase, MongoDB, API
  Role - Backend Developer
Project Objectives - It's main aim is Internal Commutation and task & Documentation
management. It's in other functionality included same as Portal, Calendar, Mobile, Cloud,
Q & A, Task Management, Dashboard, Wiki, Social Network, Forum, Document
Management etc.

-. Gift Jeenie (Android Application)
   Environment - Android Affiliate marketing Application
   Database - SQL, JAVA API Web Services
   Role - Devloper
Project Objectives - This is affiliate marketing app. With this app user can add product
links from amazon, google shopping and even web. This app crawls data from several ecommerce
sites. User can make wishlist and share it with his friends. Friend can select
gift from that wishlist. This app features of image capture, gallary image selection, video
send and receive, push notification, web crawling, deep linking with branch.io, etc.

-. RPlast (Android Application)
   Environment - Android Business Application
   Database - Oracle SQL
   Role - Devloper
Project Details and Objective - I created Dictionary for Rajkot Plastic Association. And it’s
in included All Members Personal Details and their Production Item and It’s Contact
Information, Address, E-Mail, Phone Number, Experience Year etc; If Member is traders
than they are selling Item List and It’s Contact for E-Mail Address and Mobile or Phone
Number. My Application’s Main Aim is searching easily Members Detail and fully
Information of Product. Main Advantage of this Application is it is offline Application and
it Provide direct Calling, E-Mail Sending and Messaging Facility.

-. QR-Code Reader (Android Application)
   Database - Firebase
   Role - Devloper
Project Objectives - I created QR-Code Reader Application. It’s main Advantage is by this
application We can Scan all type of Codes format: (Barcode, Partial, EAN8, UPCE, ISBN10,
UPCA, EAN13, ISBN13, I25, DATABAR, DATABAR_EXP, CODABZAR, CODE39, PDF413,
CODE93, CODE128) and also it’s in Provide Camera Change (front -back)facility , False
Light On-Off Facility. My Application’s main Aim is scan any type of QR Code and as a
result Give Result with QR code’s type.

jobs.description:
Responsibilities
Recruitment:
o	Conducting recruitment/exit interviews and recording them accordingly
o	Facilitating newcomers joining formalities
o	Reviewing & updating job descriptions for all positions regularly

Compensation & Benefits:
o	Handling monthly payroll and yearly forms for employees.
o	Liaising with all government agencies to ensure adherence to compliance laws and regulations
o	Follow up on confirmation records statutory obligations - PF, ESIC, taxes, gratuity, bonus etc.

HR Administration:
o	Communicating and explaining the organization's HR policies to the employees
o	Handling administration of all contract labor.
o	Preparing and submitting all relevant HR letters/documents/certificates/ attendance as per the requirement in consultation with the management

HR Management:
o	Handling all employee enquiries & grievances.
o	Dispute settlements according to labor law, Factory rules & compliance guidelines.

CAREER CLUB
"A Club of Career Sponsors & Seekers"

Recruitment & Selection:
• 	 Understanding the Requirements from the client.
• 	Handling the end to end recruitment procedure and various job openings in organization 
        thoroughly, work on the job descriptions.
• 	Preparing Job Description and Posting advertisement in job portal.
• 	Sourcing the CVs from Various Portals Such as LinkedIn etc.
• 	Head hunting & Industry Mapping through different social networking sites, references and 
        existing database.
•	 Pre-screen candidates before their interview for suitability and conduct interviews.
• 	Screening the profiles and conducting initial evaluation.
• 	 Handling face to face interviews, telephonic interviews.
• 	Coordinating with clients for organizing walk-ins.
• 	 Ensure CVs are of a specific standard and reflective of client requests.
• 	Follow up with the selected candidates for joining on date.
• 	Co-ordination between Technical Team of the client & Candidates for interviews.

Work Responsibility:
• 	Recruitment & Resourcing
•	Responsible for IT requirements and maintaining all the client’s updates.
•	Sourcing candidates from different job portals like Naukri, Monster, Jobsite, LinkedIn, etc
•	Scanning and short listing the most suitable CVs for the position
•	Headhunting - identifying and approaching suitable candidates 
•	Preparing JD of requirement
•	Mass-mailing and Job posting
•	Handling the full cycle of recruitment -source, screen, validate, offer, and close resources for job 
        requirements.

Bharat vijay mills, 
Sintex industries limited.

-Employee Job Satisfaction Project & Report.
-Documentation, Internal communication, Background verification, Employee-engagement, Recruitment, Employee Relations Activities 
-Support in different HR initiatives and New Projects.
Aegis Limited (A unit of ESSAR Group)

general.headline: (HR) Looking for Job Change in HR (Ahmedabad )
general.description:
Talent Acquisition:-
1. Manpower Planning / Budgeting and approval.
2. Sourcing of Resumes from various channels.
3. First level of Screening.
4. Final Salary Discussion.
5. Prepare the Salary Breakup.
6. Rollout the Offer letter.

Joining & Induction:-
1. Provide the joining formalities kit and collecting of all documents related to Education, ID Proofs, & Past Employer Experience.
2. Maintain the Personal Files of Individual
3. Opening the Salary Bank account.
4. Brief Induction Program: about the Company, General HR Admin and Reimbursement policies.
5. Issue the various types of letter to employees: Appointment/Confirmation/Transfer to On roll Letters, Appraisal Letter, Relieving letter, Experience letter. 

Monthly Reports 
1. Managing Monthly Employee's ESI Challan to Submission. 
2. Managing Monthly Employee's PF Challan to Submission. 
3.  Managing Monthly Employee's PT Challan to Submission.. 

Payroll:-
1. Make Salary Breakup.
2. Making list of Leave Approval for making adjustment from their leave balance.
3. Calculating their Daily All of Field/Office as per their attendance.

Exit Formalities & F&F settlement:-
1. Maintain the Resignation date, last working date and Salary hold list of employees.
2. Prepare the F&F Calculation sheet & arrange its payout PF Withdrawal Process.
3. Communication with Ex- employees and resolving their queries & concern.

Welfare and Benefit Administration.
1. Organising the Birthday celebration, Festivals, Days & Gifts.

jobs.description:
Recruitment & Selection:-

•	Manpower Planning / Budgeting and approval.
•	Sourcing resumes from portals/references, etc. for various vacant positions. 
•	Short listing CV's relevant for the vacant positions.  
•	Calling Shortlisted candidates for further interview of primary screening to candidates 
•	Prepare the Salary Breakup.
•	Rollout the Offer letter.
•	Follow up with candidates till they are onboard.

Joining & Induction:-
•	Provide the joining formalities kit and collecting of all documents related to Education, ID Proofs, & Past Employer Experience.
•	Brief Induction Program: about the Company, General HR Admin and Reimbursement policies.
•	Issue the various types of letter to employees: Appointment/Confirmation/Transfer to on roll Letters, Appraisal Letter, Relieving letter, Experience letter.	
•	New joined related all formalities like P.F., Bank A/c form & A/c opening procedure. 
•	Maintain the Personal Files of Individual

Time Office Management:
•	Independently looking after attendance system 
•	Making list of Leave Approval through repot for making adjustment from their leave balance.
•	Handling Payroll of 100 Employees. 
•	 Monthly MIS report like Attendance report, Leave Status report & Payroll Structure of every Month for Field/Office.
•	Managing Monthly Employee's ESI Challan , PF Challan, PT Challan to Submission. 

Exit Formalities & F&F settlement:-
•	Maintain the Resignation date, last working date and Salary hold list of employees.
•	Prepare the F&F Calculation sheet & arrange its payout PF Withdrawal Process.
•	Communication with Ex- employees and resolving their queries & concern.

Employee Engagement Activities
•	Employee Birthday Celebration, Festivals, Days & Gifts distribution

 Maintaining Employees Personnel Records.
 Coordinate General Administration.
 Supervision of Time Keeping Attendance System.
 Preparing Monthly Salary sheet.
 Maintain leave records.
 Overtime Management.
 To draft & issue different letters such as Interview call letter, Offer Letter, Appointment Letter, Relieving letter, Confirmation Letter etc.
 Preparing Resumes data bank for future requirements.
 Develop and maintain relationship with employment agencies, Colleges, universities and other recruitment sources.
 Interview job applicant, review application/resume; evaluate applicant skills and make recommendations regarding applicant's qualifications.
 Shortlist CV and schedule interview as per requirements.
 Coordinate joining formalities & Induction Program.
 Arrange, Execute & Evaluate training as per requirements.
 Purchase & Distribute Uniforms, Safety Shoes, Hand Gloves and other safety related items.
 Employee engagement activities.
 Respond to and resolve difficult and sensitive inquiries and complaints.
 Try to solve worker issues and their problems.
 Maintain Canteen facility & Transportation Management.
 Maintain API documents related to HR.
 Arranging meetings & seminars.
 Workers Colony.

general.headline: Manager HR at RPPL
general.company: RPPL - Leading colour & additive chemical manufacturer serving to Plastics industry.
general.description:
An HR Professional with more than 12+ years of experience in core HR activities with my specialization in Recruitments, talent acquisition, Performance appraisal, succession planning, employee grievance, employee engagement programs, training & development programs, managing company events and other administration activities.

Worked with reputed organizations like Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE),Mahindra & Mahindra SSG,Aditya Birla Nuvo and Calyon Bank etc.

Rich experience of working with industries like IT, Retail, Chemical, Events, Television Media, BFSI, Manufacturing through my diversified exposure. This has made me more flexible, adjustable and confident to work with any industry.

My core competency lies in the area of recruitment, Talent acquisition, Manpower Planning, Employee communication, Employee relations, Employee Engagement Programs, Induction, Training, training and development, performance appraisal, performance management system, Exit interviews, HR Generalist activities, HR Management, Vendor Management, Project Management, Client Coordination, Key Account Management etc.

I am interested to take up any challenging role in Human Resource Department.

Specialties: Thirst for Learning, Excellent-grasping capacity, Co-operative attitude, Hard working, Good interaction Skills, Problem solving abilities, Customer Coordination,Good Negotiation skills..
